Fields.SmtpServer-Help: The address of the SMTP Server used to send emails
Fields.SmtpPort-Help: The port of the SMTP Server used to send emails, default 25
Fields.SmtpUsername-Help: The username used to authenticate against the SMTP Server
Fields.SmtpPassword-Help: The password used to authenticate against the SMTP Server
Fields.Sender-Help: The email address who emails will be sent from

SendEmail.Description: Sends an email using the configured SMTP Server

Fields.Recipients-Help: A list of email addresses to send the message to
Fields.Subject: Subject
Fields.Subject-Help: The subject of the email being set
Fields.Body-Help: The content of the email message being sent. Uses the [scriban](https://github.com/scriban/scriban) templating language
